http://webcache.googleuserconten ... cache:BrybvcTiqBMJ:www.minecraftforum.net/topic/656 ... p;ct=clnk&gl=tw


Sorry, the merchants mod is gonna be discontinued as it makes no sense anymore because I will implement all of its features in the new mod. All the fixes have been made in the new mod though. And the prices as well.


The Tale of Kingdoms Pre-Release:

Info:
You are a hero, destined to become king and vanquisher of evil that plague the lands. Your adventure will be long and harsh, yet the people of your kingdom will greatly aid you in battle.
Lead and conquer the darkness that spreads your land!

The Tale of Kingdoms is a mod that gives you the chance of being a hero and a king. You will create your kingdom, build an army, defend your city and conquer the evil that lurks in your world and the nether.

The Mod is divided in to four stages:
Honor - The guild will prepare you to the path of kingship.
Wisdom - Create your kingdom tier by tier. There will be 4 tiers.
Power - Start raising your army to defend your city from the sieges of the enemy.
Conquer - face the nether to fight the army that lurks within with your army.

The first stage "honor" is the only feature that you will see in the pre-release. The mod is 70% done and what the pre-release show right now is just 15% of the real deal. This would help me assess the save file system I created and I really need some output into this.

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
THE MARKETPLACE ... 在市場裡... 

NOTE: TO GENERATE A VILLAGE, YOU MUST VISIT OR GO TO UNLOADED CHUNKS OR PLACES THAT YOU HAVE GONE TO. THE MARKETPLACE USUALLY SPAWNS IN FLAT GRASSY AREAS AND ALSO, IT WILL NOT GENERATE IN CREATIVE MODE. ALSO YOU CAN CHANGE THE PROPERTY FILE IN THE .minecraft FOLDER TO INCREASE SPAWN RATE (DEFAULT IS 35, IF YOU WANT THE VILLAGE TO SPAWN MORE FREQUENTLY, CHANGE THE VALUE TO SOMETHING LOWER) :lol: 

村莊在新區塊或你曾到過的地方都可能產生, 到處找找看吧... 
市場通常在平坦的草地上生成, 且不會在創造模式裡出現... 
你也可以更改 .minecraft 裡的設置文件, 把內定值 35 調低, 以增加生成率...

.minecraft \ Merchant.props
用記事本打開, 把裡頭 Rarity=35 數字調低即可(我試過調到1, 可以用)

王國有 1.03版了 , 看這裡 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-11324-1-1.html
你也可以只裝商人MOD啦, 就是裝 MerchantMod Ver1.1.8

王國MOD一進入遊戲會有訊息出現, 商人MOD則是附近有商人時會有訊息顯示座標

對了... 該不會你忘了先裝上 ModLoader 吧....
